author: Sanya Mansoor
title: Watch a New York City Nurse Describe The Traumatic Fight Against COVID-19
description: In a interview with Katie Couric, nurse Kelsey Owen opens up about the pressures of treating coronavirus patients
content:
Kelsey Owen, a 26-year-old nurse in New York City, opens up about the pressures of treating coronavirus patients in a new interview with Katie Couric.
Countless times, she’s had to tell family members that their loved ones are in the final hours of their lif… [+1844 chars]
